attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
not all meduims are fraudulant.
i understand that you know and understand a percentage are but there are alot of gifted, genuine, holy, kind hearted clairvoyents out there including myself and im totally disgusted with your suggestion. please consider you actions and stop these appauling accusations.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
